name: Ethology
description: Ethology is a strategy-based, full-service marketing agency with superior strength in modern search, paid media and content direction. This fast growing agency provides omnichannel solutions on an international playing field. Founded in 2010 by CEO, Jeff Pruitt, and corporately located in Scottsdale, Arizona with additional offices in Portland and Santa Monica. Ethology bases their growing success on the success of their clients and the passion of their team.
